title: Games necklace

properties.name: description
properties.value: A games necklace is a sapphire necklace which has been enchanted using the Lvl-1 Enchant spell. It has 8 charges which can teleport the player to Burthorpe,  Barbarian Outpost,  Corporeal Beast, Tears of Guthix and the Wintertodt Camp. After all 8 charges are used, the necklace will be destroyed.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 630Examine: An enchanted necklace.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Games necklaceUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Games necklace(1).pngWeight: 0.010Value: 1050Version anchor: (1)Release date: 24 November 2004Item ID: 3867

A games necklace is a sapphire necklace which has been enchanted using the Lvl-1 Enchant spell. It has 8 charges which can teleport the player to Burthorpe, Barbarian Outpost, Corporeal Beast, Tears of Guthix and the Wintertodt Camp. After all 8 charges are used, the necklace will be destroyed.

When a games necklace has one charge remaining, it is recommended not to use the last charge, but instead to save it and cast High Level Alchemy on it, as the necklace's alchemy value is irrespective of its charge.

Teleportation options[edit | edit source]

Destination Map
Barbarian Outpost
Burthorpe Games Room

  2. ^ Must have visited Zeah at least once

Price per teleport[edit | edit source]

Because the high alchemy value is the same regardless of the number of charges, some of the cost of usage can be reclaimed by alching when one charge remains.

Item Necklace Cost Cost Per Teleport Cost if Alching[n 1]
Games necklace(8) 810 101 54
  1. ^ Assuming a staff of fire or variant is used.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 August 2017
(update)

Partially charged versions of the item could now be turned into bank placeholders.

24 September 2015
(update)

The games necklace teleport menu now lists Burthorpe rather than Burthorpe games room, to reflect the recent change in teleport location.

25 June 2015
(update | poll)

The destinations of the games room minigame teleport and games necklace teleport have been switched.

21 May 2015
(update)

Games necklace worn interface options no longer refer to the Barbarian Outpost as Barbarian Assault.

26 February 2015
(update)

Partially charged versions of the item were made untradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.

30 April 2007
(update)

The item was graphically updated.

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
24 November 2004
30 April 2007 		30 April 2007
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Only the fully charged games necklace can be traded on the Grand Exchange.
  • The in-game price checker can still calculate the price of partially charged necklace as a fraction of the GE price of a fully charged necklace.
